mapper.select: /* USE : DlvrProdMultiMapper.getDlvrColList */ SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS DLVR_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS DLVR_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '112' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD NOT IN ('1') /* 코드 1(포스앱)은 포스에서 사용하는 코드이므로 나오지 않도록 함 */ ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(tcn.NMCODE_CD)

/* USE : DlvrProdMultiMapper.getProdList */
SELECT thpdpnm.SEQ, thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM,
thpdpnm.DLVR_PROD_NM_${item}
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SEQ, HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM
, REG_DT
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI ) PIVOT ( MIN(DLVR_PROD_NM) FOR DLVR_NAME_CD IN (${pivotDlvrCol}) ) ) thpdpnm WHERE thpdpnm.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpdpnm.PROD_CD (+)= thp.PROD_CD AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND thpdpnm.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' --상품코드
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND BARCD_CD = #{barCd} ) --바코드
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thp.USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부
AND (
thpdpnm.DLVR_PROD_NM_${item} LIKE '%' || #{channelProdNm} || '%' --채널사상품명
)
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD, thpdpnm.SEQ ASC
SELECT tmpdpnm.SEQ, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM,
tmpdpnm.DLVR_PROD_NM_${item}
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SEQ, STORE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI ) PIVOT ( MIN (DLVR_PROD_NM) FOR DLVR_NAME_CD IN (${pivotDlvrCol}) ) ) tmpdpnm WHERE tmpdpnm.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpdpnm.PROD_CD (+) = tmp.PROD_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' --상품코드
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND BARCD_CD = #{barCd} ) --바코드
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmp.USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부
AND (
tmpdpnm.DLVR_PROD_NM_${item} LIKE '%' || #{channelProdNm} || '%' --채널사상품명
)
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD, tmpdpnm.SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: /* DlvrProdMapper.getDlvrProdMultiNmStoreRegistSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI ( SEQ, STORE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DLVR_MAPPING_FG ) SELECT SEQ, #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, DLVR_MAPPING_FG FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PROD_CD IN (${selectProdCd})

/* DlvrProdMultiMapper.getDlvrProdMultiNmMappingChkSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_TMP_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM ( SESSION_ID,
SEQ,
HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{sessionId},
#{seq},
#{hqOfficeCd}, #{storeCd}, #{prodCd}, #{dlvrNameCd}, #{dlvrProdNm}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select:
/* DlvrProdMultiMapper.getDlvrProdMultiNmMappingChk */
SELECT LISTAGG(DLVR_PROD_NM, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DLVR_PROD_NM) AS DLVR_PROD_NM FROM ( SELECT DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM FROM TB_TMP_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM WHERE 1=1 AND SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND DLVR_PROD_NM IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT A.DLVR_NAME_CD, A.DLVR_PROD_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI A WHERE 1=1 AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.DLVR_PROD_NM IS NOT NULL -- 수정할 데이터는 COUNT에서 빼야되서 제거 AND A.SEQ || '/' ||
A.PROD_CD ||'/'|| A.DLVR_NAME_CD NOT IN ( SELECT B.SEQ || '/' ||
B.PROD_CD ||'/'|| B.DLVR_NAME_CD FROM TB_TMP_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM B WHERE 1=1 AND B.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD AND B.DLVR_NAME_CD = A.DLVR_NAME_CD ) ) GROUP BY DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 )
SELECT LISTAGG(DLVR_PROD_NM, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DLVR_PROD_NM) AS DLVR_PROD_NM FROM ( SELECT DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM FROM TB_TMP_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM WHERE 1=1 AND SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND DLVR_PROD_NM IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT A.DLVR_NAME_CD, A.DLVR_PROD_NM FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM_MULTI A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND A.DLVR_PROD_NM IS NOT NULL -- 수정할 데이터는 COUNT에서 빼야되서 제거 AND A.SEQ || '/' ||
A.PROD_CD ||'/'|| A.DLVR_NAME_CD NOT IN ( SELECT B.SEQ || '/' ||
B.PROD_CD ||'/'|| B.DLVR_NAME_CD FROM TB_TMP_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM B WHERE 1=1 AND B.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND B.PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD AND B.DLVR_NAME_CD = A.DLVR_NAME_CD ) ) GROUP BY DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 )
